001package net.tvburger.jdl.adaline;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.Neuron;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.ObjectiveFunction;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Optimizer;
007
008public class LeastMeanSquares implements Optimizer.OnlineOnly<Adaline, Float> {
009
010    private float learningRate;
011
012    public LeastMeanSquares(float learningRate) {
013        this.learningRate = learningRate;
014    }
015
016    public float getLearningRate() {
017        return learningRate;
018    }
019
020    public void setLearningRate(float learningRate) {
021        this.learningRate = learningRate;
022    }
023
024    @Override
025    public void optimize(Adaline adaline, DataSet.Sample<Float> sample, ObjectiveFunction objective) {
026        Float[] estimated = adaline.estimate(sample.features());
027        Float[] gradients = objective.calculateGradient_dJ_da(1, estimated, sample.targetOutputs());
028        for (int j = 0; j < estimated.length; j++) {
029            Neuron node = adaline.getNeuron(adaline.getDepth(), j, Neuron.class);
030            float errorSignal = gradients[j];
031            for (int d = 1; d <= sample.featureCount(); d++) {
032                node.getNeuronFunction().adjustParameter(d, learningRate * errorSignal * sample.features()[d - 1]);
033            }
034            node.adjustParameter(0, learningRate * errorSignal);
035        }
036    }
037}
